title: Understanding Bold Style
text: Bold style is often used to make certain text stand out. Think about why you might want to emphasize a particular cell in a worksheet.

title: Purpose of Emphasis
text: Consider situations where you need to draw attention to specific data or information. Why would making text bold help in these cases?

hintAnswer: To emphasize it or make it stand out from the rest of the worksheet
title: Choosing the Correct Reason
text: Select the reason why boldface text is applied to a cell.
choices: To emphasize it or make it stand out from the rest of the worksheet
to increase the amount of time someone spends on the worksheet
to see new characteristics in the font
